mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD WHERE STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_WRITER, ORIGIN_NAME, COUNT, TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "CREATE_DATE" FROM BOARD WHERE STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD SET COUNT = COUNT + 1 WHERE BOARD_NO = #{bno} AND STATUS = 'Y'
mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_WRITER, BOARD_CONTENT, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME, COUNT, TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "CREATE_DATE" FROM BOARD WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND BOARD_NO = #{bno}

SELECT REPLY_NO AS replyNo, REPLY_CONTENT AS replyContent, REPLY_WRITER AS replyWriter, TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS createDate FROM REPLY WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND REF_BNO = #{bno} ORDER BY REPLY_NO DESC
